sentences: Esitame palve, et teil oleks hea meel.
Kutsutakse k√µiki osalema, et esitada oma murekohtudest.
context: The word 'esitada' in Estonian is commonly used to mean presenting or introducing something, whether it be an idea, a person, or a plan. It can also be used in formal and informal settings to bring up a topic for discussion.
